payload.title: Dashboard: Hide completed tasks in priority view
payload.description: When sorting the dashboard by priority, it currently shows tasks with statuses like 'done', 'completed', and 'archived'. This clutters the view with non-actionable items. This task is to modify the sorting logic for the 'priority' view in 'packages/cli/src/components/dashboard/DashboardTUI.tsx' to filter out tasks with these statuses, making the view more focused on actionable work.
references: Expected CLI version: v1.8.0 (minor bump from v1.7.1 due to feat commit)
